availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kentucky, soldier and surgeon. Kentucky native. Served in the 55th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as assistant surgeon and surgeon from April 11, 1865 to September 19, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 467.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Kentucky, Application #648.946, Certificate #448.060.
Find A Grave, "Dr. Benjamin Franklin Slaughter (Apr 10, 1842-Dec 26, 1896)," Memorial #73459357, http://www.findagravecom/memorial/73459357 (accessed September 24, 2020).
